column1: A viewing will be held at Romero Funeral Home Chapel on Sunday
column2: June 14th at 2:00 p.m. with a rosary to be recited at 3:00 p.m. A final viewing will be held at Our Lady of Belen Catholic Church on Monday
column3: June 15th at 9:00 a.m. with a Funeral Mass to be celebrated at 10:00 a.m. Interment will follow at Our Lady of Belen Memorial Gardens.
